description: This global Level-3 (L3) data set provides a daily composite of snow cover and albedo derived from the 'MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 5-Min L2 Swath 500m' data set (DOI:10.5067/MODIS/MYD10_L2.061). Each data granule is a 10°x10° tile projected to a 500 m sinusoidal grid.

links.title: MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid
MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 500m SIN Grid, Version 61. Boulder, Colorado USA. NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center.

eo:bands.name: Maximum_Snow_Extent
eo:bands.description: Maximum snow extent observed over an eight-day period.

eo:bands.name: Eight_Day_Snow_Cover
eo:bands.description: Snow chronology bit flags for each day in the eight-day observation period.

title: MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid
